definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)

sentences.english: Sometimes a lack of information can lead workers to misperceive that there's preferential treatment, says Mr. Reed.
sentences.chinese: 裏德說，有時候信息的缺乏會讓員工誤以爲老闆偏心。

sentences.english: The boss promoted him to the post of chief accountant.
sentences.chinese: 老闆提升他爲會計室主任。
老闆喜歡認真工作的員工。

sentences.english: He had to hit the bullet and give into his boss's unreasonable demands.
sentences.chinese: 是他勉爲其難，讓步接受了老闆的苛刻要求。

sentences.english: The boss kicked Tom out of the factory.
sentences.chinese: 老闆把湯姆踢出工廠大門。

sentences.english: The grocer studies to please his customers.
sentences.chinese: 雜貨商老闆考慮着要迎合顧客。

sentences.english: Pinocchio was not able to walk, therefore, the boss sold him to an old drummer.
sentences.chinese: 木偶行唔到，於是老闆就賣左比個老鼓手。

sentences.english: He is the boss's favourite because he is a yesman.
sentences.chinese: 他是老闆的寵愛，因爲他是應聲蟲。

sentences.english: The owner and small dust is all quite surprised, might it not be this white dress is the youth also a coquette?
sentences.chinese: 老闆和小塵都十分驚訝，莫非這白衣少年也是狐狸精？

sentences.english: Since the bosses can't do without profit workers have an dege.
sentences.chinese: 由於老闆不能沒有利潤，工人們就佔了上風。

sentences.english: When I am about to nod off in the office, the boss walked in.
sentences.chinese: 我在辦公室剛剛欲睡，老闆走了進來。

sentences.english: I mean , he is the king of idiots.
sentences.chinese: 我的老闆真是愚蠢，我的意思是他是個大白癡。

sentences.english: The boss in whose company Mr. Kang worked called at the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 老闆到醫院拜訪了康先生，康先生在他的公司裏工作。

sentences.english: Pisces will generally not mind if the Aries wants to be the boss.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚通常不會在意白羊是否想成爲老闆。

sentences.english: The inn-keeper's wife wasn't there: she'd slipped while climbing the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 酒館老闆的妻子沒有來，她爬樓梯的時候滑到了。

sentences.english: Tally your accomplishments, and make your boss aware of them on a regularbasis.
sentences.chinese: 記錄你的工作成果，並不時讓你的老闆知道你的努力。

definition: master/qualified worker/respectful form of address for older men/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
